quiz.title: Demonstratives (this/that/these/those) - A1 Level
quiz.description: Master demonstratives for near and far objects in singular and plural forms at A1 level.

questions.prompt: ____ is my book. (pointing to a book near you)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects near you.
questions.hint: Is the book near or far? Is it singular or plural?

questions.prompt: ____ are my pens. (pointing to pens near you)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects near you.
questions.hint: Are the pens near or far? Are they singular or plural?

questions.prompt: ____ is her car. (pointing to a car far away)
questions.explanation: Use 'That' for singular objects far from you.
questions.hint: Is the car near or far? Is it singular or plural?

questions.prompt: ____ are their bags. (pointing to bags far away)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects far from you.
questions.hint: Are the bags near or far? Are they singular or plural?

questions.prompt: What is ____? (holding something in your hand)
questions.explanation: Use 'this' for singular objects very close to you.
questions.hint: Is the object in your hand near or far?

questions.prompt: Who are ____? (pointing to people near you)
questions.explanation: Use 'these' for plural people or things near you.
questions.hint: Are the people near or far? Are they singular or plural?

questions.prompt: I like ____ dress. (pointing to a dress in a shop window)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the dress near you or far away?

questions.prompt: ____ shoes are expensive. (pointing to shoes in a display case)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Are the shoes near or far? Are they singular or plural?

questions.prompt: ____ chair is comfortable. (sitting on a chair)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects very close to you.
questions.hint: Is the chair you're sitting on near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ books are heavy. (carrying books)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are holding or very close to.
questions.hint: Are the books you're carrying near or far?

questions.prompt: Can you see ____ building? (pointing across the street)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the building across the street near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ flowers smell nice. (smelling flowers in your hand)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects very close to you.
questions.hint: Are the flowers in your hand near or far?

questions.prompt: Is ____ your phone? (pointing to a phone on the table near you)
questions.explanation: Use 'this' for singular objects near you.
questions.hint: Is the phone on the table near you or far away?

questions.prompt: Are ____ your keys? (pointing to keys on a distant table)
questions.explanation: Use 'those' for plural objects far from you.
questions.hint: Are the keys on the distant table near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ apple tastes good. (eating an apple)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are using or very close to.
questions.hint: Is the apple you're eating near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ cookies are delicious. (eating cookies)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are using or very close to.
questions.hint: Are the cookies you're eating near or far?

questions.prompt: I want ____ toy. (pointing to a toy in a shop window)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the toy in the shop window near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ students are studying hard. (pointing to students in another classroom)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural people at a distance.
questions.hint: Are the students in another classroom near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ coffee is hot. (drinking coffee)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are using.
questions.hint: Is the coffee you're drinking near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ glasses are mine. (wearing glasses)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are wearing or very close to.
questions.hint: Are the glasses you're wearing near or far?

questions.prompt: Look at ____ bird! (pointing to a bird in a tree far away)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the bird in the tree far away near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ pencils are sharp. (using pencils on your desk)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects on your desk or very close to you.
questions.hint: Are the pencils on your desk near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ house is beautiful. (pointing to a house across the field)
questions.explanation: Use 'That' for singular objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the house across the field near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ children are playing. (watching children in a playground from your window)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural people at a distance.
questions.hint: Are the children in the playground (viewed from your window) near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ sandwich is tasty. (eating a sandwich)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are using or eating.
questions.hint: Is the sandwich you're eating near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ papers are important. (holding papers)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are holding.
questions.hint: Are the papers you're holding near or far?

questions.prompt: Do you like ____ song? (listening to music on your phone)
questions.explanation: Use 'this' for singular things you are currently experiencing.
questions.hint: Is the song playing on your phone near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ cars are expensive. (looking at cars in a distant parking lot)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects at a distance.
questions.hint: Are the cars in the distant parking lot near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ watch is expensive. (looking at your own watch)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are wearing or very close to.
questions.hint: Is your own watch near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ shoes are comfortable. (wearing shoes)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are wearing.
questions.hint: Are the shoes you're wearing near or far?

questions.prompt: I can't reach ____ book. (pointing to a book on a high shelf)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects that are not easily reachable or at a distance.
questions.hint: Is the book on the high shelf near or far from your reach?

questions.prompt: ____ magazines are old. (pointing to magazines on a shelf across the room)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects across the room or at a distance.
questions.hint: Are the magazines across the room near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ computer works well. (using your computer)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are currently using.
questions.hint: Is the computer you're using near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ headphones are loud. (wearing headphones)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are wearing or using.
questions.hint: Are the headphones you're wearing near or far?

questions.prompt: Can you see ____ star? (pointing to a star in the sky)
questions.explanation: Use 'that' for singular objects very far away like stars.
questions.hint: Is the star in the sky near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ clouds look like animals. (looking at clouds in the sky)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects very far away like clouds.
questions.hint: Are the clouds in the sky near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ pizza is delicious. (eating pizza)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular food you are currently eating.
questions.hint: Is the pizza you're eating near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ grapes are sweet. (eating grapes)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural food you are currently eating.
questions.hint: Are the grapes you're eating near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ mountain is very high. (looking at a mountain in the distance)
questions.explanation: Use 'That' for singular objects very far away like mountains.
questions.hint: Is the mountain in the distance near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ trees are very tall. (looking at trees on a distant hill)
questions.explanation: Use 'Those' for plural objects at a distance like trees on a hill.
questions.hint: Are the trees on the distant hill near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ ring is beautiful. (looking at a ring on your finger)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular objects you are wearing.
questions.hint: Is the ring on your finger near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ earrings are pretty. (wearing earrings)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural objects you are wearing.
questions.hint: Are the earrings you're wearing near or far?

questions.prompt: ____ movie is boring. (watching a movie in a cinema)
questions.explanation: Use 'This' for singular things you are currently experiencing.
questions.hint: Is the movie you're watching near or far from your experience?

questions.prompt: ____ people are friendly. (talking about people you just met)
questions.explanation: Use 'These' for plural people you are currently with or just interacted with.
questions.hint: Are the people you just met near or far from your current experience?
